meanings.definition: The study of the causes or origins of diseases.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often research different etiologies to understand how diseases start.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the etiologies of illnesses helps in developing effective treatments.
meanings.sent3: The class on etiologies was so interesting that even the students who usually slept paid attention.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the etiologies of diseases is like solving a complex puzzle with many pieces.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the etiologies of various diseases in a way that was easy to remember.
